sentences.en: ...a pocket calculator.
sentences.cn: …一个袖珍计算器。

sentences.en: "Thanks friend," he said, while sweeping the money into his pocket.
sentences.cn: “谢了，朋友，”他说着就把钱划拉进了口袋。

sentences.en: a pocket dictionary
sentences.cn: 袖珍词典

sentences.en: Anthony snatched his letters and pocketed them.
sentences.cn: 安东尼抓过他的信，放进了衣袋中。

sentences.en: By the 1930s the wristwatch had almost completely supplanted the pocket watch.
sentences.cn: 到了20世纪30年代，手表几乎完全取代了怀表。

sentences.en: Dishonest importers would be able to pocket the VAT collected from customers.
sentences.cn: 不诚实的进口商将会能够把从顾客那里收取的增值税据为己有。

sentences.en: Frank took a large ring of keys from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克从口袋里掏出一大串钥匙。

sentences.en: He dug into his coat pocket for his keys.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进上衣口袋里摸钥匙。

sentences.en: He had four hundred dollars in his pocket. Billy had more.
sentences.cn: 他兜里有400美元，比利带的钱更多。

sentences.en: He pulled a handkerchief from his pocket and gave it to him.
sentences.cn: 他从口袋里掏出手绢递给他。

sentences.en: He reached into his breast pocket for his cigar case.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进胸前口袋里拿雪茄烟盒。

sentences.en: I charge twenty dollars an hour plus out-of-pocket expenses.
sentences.cn: 我每小时收取20美元，另加垫付的现金开支。

sentences.en: I felt for my wallet and papers in my inside pocket.
sentences.cn: 我在里兜里摸钱包和证件。

sentences.en: I'm tired of villages where everyone lives in everyone else's pocket.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌那些人与人都很近乎的村落。

sentences.en: Luke came in with his hands in his pockets.
sentences.cn: 卢克走了进来，双手插在口袋里。

sentences.en: Maggie locked the door and pocketed the keys.
sentences.cn: 玛吉锁上门，把钥匙放进口袋里。

sentences.en: Reaching into her pocket, she brought out a cigarette.
sentences.cn: 她伸手从兜里掏出来一支烟。

sentences.en: She put the pieces of card in her pocket.
sentences.cn: 她把那些硬纸片放进了口袋。

sentences.en: She put the receipt into the innermost pocket of her bag.
sentences.cn: 她把收据放在提包最里面的口袋里。

sentences.en: Something was sticking from the pocket of the little man's grimy shorts.
sentences.cn: 小个子男人脏乎乎的短裤口袋里鼓鼓的，伸出来个什么东西。

sentences.en: The defendant had the jury in his pocket.
sentences.cn: 被告已控制了陪审团

sentences.en: The policeman told me to turn out my pockets (= take everything out of them ) .
sentences.cn: 警察让我把口袋里的东西都掏出来。

sentences.en: was a hundred dollars in pocket after a day at the races.
sentences.cn: 在赌马场上呆了一天后兜里有了一百美元

sentences.en: With trembling fingers, he removed the camera from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 他手指哆嗦着从口袋里取出相机.

words.tran_cn: 可放在口袋里的；可供私用的；可隐藏的
小型的，袖珍的；金钱上的

phrases.tran_cn: 气穴；（大气中使汽机突然下跌的）气陷
受制于人、由他人支配：处在某人的权力、影响或财产下
赚钱，捞回本：赚取了或保住了一定数额的资金
[美国俚语](吸毒时)处于心醉神迷的佳境中
饱入私囊：获取利润，尤指通过非法途径
袖珍计算器；便携式计算器

phrases.phrase: put one's hand in one's pocket

trans.tran_en: small enough to be carried in your pocket

trans.tran_cn: 衣袋，小容器，钱，小区域，球袋
trans.tran_en: a type of small bag in or on a coat, trousers etc that you can put money, keys etc in

trans.tran_cn: 把…装进衣袋，盗用，揩油，赚取，把…击入球袋
trans.tran_en: If someone pockets something, they put it in their pocket, for example, because they want to steal it or hide it
